title: How to use only 50% of tokens in crowdsale?

body:
Hi @Dougy2800! In general, you should be able to mint the remaining tokens in the `finalize` method. You can find an example of this in the [Decentraland crowdsale](https://github.com/decentraland/mana/blob/master/contracts/MANACrowdsale.sol#L169-L176).

I will close this issue now, please reopen if you have any other questions.
